      • parse

        public static com.wm.data.IData parse(java.lang.String string)
                               throws javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException
        Parses the given MIME type string to an IData representation.
        Parameters:
        string - The MIME type string to be parsed.
        Returns:
        An IData representation of the MIME type string.
        Throws:
        javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException - If the given MIME type string is malformed.

      • emit

        public static java.lang.String emit(com.wm.data.IData document)
                             throws javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException
        Returns a MIME type string comprised of the components specified in the given IData document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document to be converted to a MIME type string.
        Returns:
        A MIME type string representing the components specified in the given IData document.
        Throws:
        javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException - If the given MIME type string is malformed.

      • normalize

        public static java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String string)
                                  throws javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException
        Normalizes a MIME type string by removing extraneous whitespace characters, and listing parameters in alphabetical order.
        Parameters:
        string - The MIME type string to be normalized.
        Returns:
        The normalized MIME type string.
        Throws:
        javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException - If the MIME type string is malformed.

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.lang.String string1,
                            java.lang.String string2)
                     throws javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException
        Returns true if the given MIME type strings are considered equivalent because their types and subtypes match (parameters are not considered in the comparison).
        Parameters:
        string1 - The first MIME type string to be compare.
        string2 - The second MIME type string to be compared.
        Returns:
        True if the two MIME type strings are considered equal, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        javax.activation.MimeTypeParseException - If either of the MIME type strings are malformed.

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String string,
                               boolean raise)
                        throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given string is a valid MIME type, optionally throwing an exception if the string is invalid.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to validate.
        raise - Whether an exception should be thrown if the string is an invalid MIME type.
        Returns:
        True if the string is a well-formed MIME type.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given string is an invalid MIME type.

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String string)
        Returns true if the given string is a valid MIME type.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to validate.
        Returns:
        True if the string is a well-formed MIME type.
